job.title: Principal Software Engineer, Marketplace Apps
job.description: <strong><u>Overview<br><br></u></strong>Top "Must-Have" Skills for this job:<br><ul><li> 8+ years of professional experience building backend web applications</li><li> Strong knowledge and experience with the web request/response lifecycle an API design</li><li> Hands-on experience with Node.JS and TypeScript</li><li> Software development experience with transactional systems, trading systems, e-commerce, or marketplaces</li><li> Experience deploying and monitoring software in the cloud (AWS)</li><li> Strong communicator with both technical and non-technical professionals</li><li> Bachelor or Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a Related Field<br></li></ul><strong><u>Selling Points<br></u></strong><ul><li> Full Benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision)</li><li> 401K Plan</li><li> PTO, Sick Days</li><li> Parental Leave</li><li> Ability to work Remote</li><li> Catered Lunches</li><li> And much more!</li></ul>
